overview:
I am K.S.S.Kumar from Vijayawada. I am Grand son of a Scientist, Son of Doctor and Son-in-Law of a Professor. I am an innovator who always try to better things in their performance and presentation.

Probably by the effect of my Genetic Inheritance I have brought out many useful and innovative products for the human race and life. The various facets finally resulted in the form of various products in various segments.

I have brought out A sweet tasting tea for diabetics which is sweet in taste and is really useful for diabetics.

Another useful product is that which is a herbal based spray for household plants for proper protection and promotion.

Another very useful product is a solar home light system that would give 3-4 hours of light every day and has an estimated life of about 5 years.

I have presented an innovative concept on managing Psoriasis. The book named as “Comprehensive Management of Psoriasis with CeNoMed Therapy” This book would be the future Bible for Psoriatic patients.

Apart from these there are other products and services too. You can view a good lot of them in my site www.srisms.com and www.anmolnaturals.com
